info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 10:33PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A few strong storms will impact portions of southeastern Iredell and southwestern Rowan Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1031 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong storm 7 miles northwest of Kannapolis, or 4 miles northwest of Enochville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salisbury, Kannapolis, Mooresville, China Grove, Spencer, Landis, Enochville, Granite Quarry, Faith and Mount Ulla. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
